title: NTP Ep. 8 - How Shawn Johnson East Learned There is More to Life than Gold Medals
description:
Remember the 2008 Olympics? We were all cheering and rallying for gymnast Shawn Johnson and now it feels surreal that she's sharing her story with us this week. This is one of those episodes you won't want to miss! Imagine the pressure, the expectations, the gold medals, and leaving it all behind.

Follow Shawn on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/shawnjohnson/
Watch Shawn's I Am Second video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BEmtRuJwb7A

Thanks to Molekule. For a limited time, save up to $120 on Molekule air purifiers by going to molekule.com and entering the promo code MADEFORTHIS at checkout.
itunes:author: Jennie Allen
